author: Robert Kodama
comment: It's quite convenient, but there are features you need to pay for as part of a subscription

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content:
Thank you for using our service.
This is 乗換案内 user support.

Extra features such as changing conditions for route search, notification of operation information, saving search history are provided as paid services.
While basic route search is available for free, please also consider trying our other paid features.

Sincerely,

author: kokon1031 ENL
comment: 定番アプリ。A must-have app.

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content:
★5ついただきまして、ありがとうございます！
乗換案内ユーザーサポートです。

今後もご利用いただけるよう、より良いアプリ作りを心がけて参りますので、よろしくお願いいたします。

comment: 定期代検索も出来たらいいですね。

comment: I love the application but translated, it would be perfect.

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content: Thank you for your comment. We also supply a multi language route finder app [Japan Transit Planner] in Google Play store. It is a pay-app but please check and make good use of it.

author: Alisson Ninomia
comment: If you're a foreigner in Japan, you'll want to download this as soon as possible. All routes, no ads, no mistaken timetables. ほとんどのアプリだと、様々な機能を使うには「プレミアムにご加入ください」と押してくるのに対し、このアプリは無料版だけでバス·地下鉄·電車全部をうまくつなげて最適ルートを見つけてくれる。バス停の位置がより正確になったのはとても嬉しい。

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content:
バスの検索をご活用いただき、ありがとうございます！
乗換案内ユーザーサポートです。

その他にも、サポートをご希望のバス路線がございましたら、お気軽にアプリ内「FAQ（お問合せ）」までご連絡くださいませ。

title: (Foreigners in Japan should download this)これを使って困ったことがない

Why don't you add English language option?? If there was English language, the app would help more people and get 5 stars

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content: Thank you for your comment. We also supply a multi language route finder app [Japan Transit Planner] in Google Play store. It is a pay-app but please check and make good use of it.

title: No English

author: Gordius Leung
comment: I think this app is a lot better than all the useless apps and does not have problems at all. But, it needs to have an English version as Japan also speaks English as their language and the whole map already have an English name. If this is added (and the system too), I will definitely rate it 5 stars.

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content: Thank you for your comment! This is Jorudan user support! We are glad that our App has been usful to you! We will keep upgrading our App so please make good use of it!

title: Great app!

author: A F
comment: I've been faithfully using this for almost a yr until a friend intro me to Y! & I've switched. I like that the transfer walking time is clearly indicated, diff frm Y! & 乗換案内, but it doesn't tell u which train car number to board, which annoys me.

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content: Thank you for your comment and the compliment! We will consider and progress the functions including car number suggestions! We hope you to use our app again! Feel free for any questions!

author: AzumiRM
comment: If you live in a major city in japan then thia app is more or less essential and one of the first apps you should install when getting a new device. There are no ads and the interface is simple to use. Always 100% accurate.

reply.author: Jorudan Co.,Ltd.
reply.content:
Thank you for your comment!This is Jorudan user support!

We are glad that our app is being useful for your life in Japan!You won't be lost even in the Tokyo/Osaka railway jungle with our app!
